# The `GenericUniformityAnalysisImpl` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Analysis that identifies uniform values in a data-parallel execution. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename ContextT&gt;
class llvm::GenericUniformityAnalysisImpl&lt;ContextT&gt;</CodeBlock>

  name={<><a href="#a69d6aed02710d05d99dd0a070d5946e2">UniformOverrides</a></>}>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Analysis that identifies uniform values in a data-parallel execution.

This analysis propagates divergence in a data-parallel context from sources of divergence to all users. It can be instantiated for an IR that provides a suitable <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a18ba42e2b2b1ad11b1ffa7c21fb0756d">SSAContext</a>.

Definition at line 327 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericuniformityimpl-h">GenericUniformityImpl.h</a>.
